Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.27818338]Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli (ATCC 25922)(MIC=16μM);A. salmonicida (ATCC 33658)(MIC=16μM);Y. ruckeri (NCIMB 1315)(MIC=16μM);Gram-positive bacteria:Staphylococcus aureus (ATCC 25923)(MIC=64μM)

Sequence Information.Function: Antibacterial activity against the Gram-positive and Gram-negative bacteria.The peptides inhibit the growth of V. anguillarum or A. hydrophila (MIC >32

Literature.Title: Antimicrobial and host cell-directed activities of Gly/Ser-rich peptides from salmonid cathelicidins.
Literature.Author: D'Este F, Benincasa M, Cannone G, Furlan M, Scarsini M, Volpatti D, Gennaro R, Tossi A, Skerlavaj B, Scocchi M.
